ResearchProjectDef.label: impact-tip munitions
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build heavy weapons that utilize impact-tip cartridges, which explode on collision. Note that these also require advanced components.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->discovered an ancient still functional impact rifle, wielding it into battle
subject_story->destroyed a truck of enemy reinforcements with their impact stubber
subject_story->utilized illegally-acquired technology to build and sell impact weapons

ResearchProjectDef.label: crusader armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build crusader armor, a super-heavy ancient-pattern powered armor suit used across the known galaxy for its reliability and durability. Note that these also require advanced components.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->blocked a volley of projectiles, saving an entire family in the midst of their escape
subject_story->drop podded directly through an enemy vessel like a cannonball, taking over it
subject_story->exterminated a village of cannibals and left without a scratch
